risks.title: Radiation
risks.description: When outside Earth's magnetic field, astronauts are exposed to higher levels of radiation. This can increase cancer risk, damage the central nervous system, and reduce motor function
risks.solution: Our deep space vehicles have additional radiation shielding and monitoring equipment. Additionally, we make sure to monitor our voyagers and provide them with appropriate medication to reduce the effects of radiation and defend against it

risks.title: Isolation
risks.description: Our spacecraft offer limited space for passengers to move around, unlike their homes and facilities on Earth, causing changes in behavior such as sleep cycle disturbances and feelings of isolation without personal device Internet access.
risks.solution: All of our sleep cabins use light therapy to maintain circadian rhythms, and provide numerous activties on-board, allowing passengers to socialize and stay active.

risks.title: Distance From Earth
risks.description: Because Mars is around 140 million miles away from us, all flight emergencies have to be dealt with on the flight, as support will not reach in time. Additionally, with a communication delay of around 20 minutes between Earth, all immediate emergencies must be dealt with on board.
risks.solution: All of our passengers must qualify certain health screenings to board the flight, minimizing medical emergencies. Additionally, our spacecraft are equipped with a medical lab, with trained physicians to deal with any health risks.

risks.title: Gravity Changes
risks.description: Changes in gravity from Earth, to space, to on Mars can have various effects on astronauts' bodies. Additionally, readjusting to Earth's gravity on return can be an extensive process
risks.solution: To keep passengers' bones and muscles strong, even in low gravity situations, we have state-of-the-art exercise machines that all passengers must use. Additionally, we provide passengers with FDA-approved osteoporosis medicine to keep thier bones healthy

risks.title: Hostile Environments
risks.description: The ecosystem on-board the craft makes a huge impact on the quality of the trip for our passengers. Factors like temperature, humidity, and space can make or break an experience.
risks.solution: We make sure to conduct urine and blood tests on our passengers to maintain their health. We also control environmental factors extensively, and ensure recycled air and waste are completely safe for passengers.

features.title: Propulsion Redundancy
features.description: Starship's booster can lose up to 6 of it's 33 engines and still function flawlessly.

features.title: Landing Systems
features.description: Starship is designed to be able to land on any surface, it employs both propuslive and aerodynamic landing to make one of the most safe landing systems.

features.title: Launch Escape System
features.description: Starship has the ability to fly away from it's booster stage in case of a booster malfunction, and then safely land back on Earth.

features.title: State-of-the-Art Heat Shielding
features.description: Starship has industry leading heat shields gauranteeing that you will feel no different during your atmospheric entry.

features.title: Propulsion Redundancy
features.description: Falcon 9 can lose multiple engines or have a fuel tank blocked and wouldn't lose the ability to go to space.

features.title: Dragon Capsule
features.description: Passengers will be inside the Dragon capsule which is stocked with life support systems, environmental control systems, and other features to ensure your safety and comfort.

features.title: Water Landing
features.description: The Dragon Capsule will be able to land on any body of water in the world using Falcon 9's advanced pathfinding and landing systems.

features.title: Launch Escape System
features.description: The Dragon Capsule can rapidly boost away from the Falcon 9 in the unlikely event of an emergency, protecting all passengers on board.

features.title: Propulsion Redundancy
features.description: New Glenn's first stage can lose 1 of it's 7 engines and still function flawlessly.

features.title: Weather Compatibility
features.description: New Glenn can fly in 95% of weather conditions, rain or shine you're going to space!

features.title: Launch Escape System
features.description: New Glenn's second stage can propulsively boost away from the first-stage in the unlikely event of a malfunction.
